sections.title: Meetings and Negotiations → Reuniones y negociaciones

listening.audio: What's the most important aspect of successful negotiations?
How should disagreements be handled in professional meetings?

options: Clear agenda, active participation, and defined outcomes

fillInBlank.feedback: Thorough preparation ensures meetings are productive and achieve their intended goals.
Active listening helps build understanding and leads to better negotiation outcomes.

fillInBlank.suffix: the final agreement and next steps.
fillInBlank.feedback: Confirming agreements ensures everyone understands their commitments and responsibilities.

sections.title: Conflict Resolution and Diplomacy → Resolución de conflictos y diplomacia

items.english: I understand your concerns, and I'd like to address them
items.spanish: Entiendo tus preocupaciones y me gustaría abordarlas

items.english: Perhaps we could find a middle ground on this issue
items.spanish: Tal vez podríamos encontrar un término medio en este tema

items.english: Let's focus on our common objectives
items.spanish: Enfoquémonos en nuestros objetivos comunes

items.english: I appreciate your perspective, however, I see it differently
items.spanish: Aprecio tu perspectiva, sin embargo, lo veo de manera diferente

items.english: Could we step back and look at the bigger picture?
items.spanish: Â¿Podríamos dar un paso atrás y ver el panorama general?

items.english: I'd like to propose a compromise solution
items.spanish: Me gustaría proponer una solución de compromiso

items.english: Let's try to separate the people from the problem
items.spanish: Tratemos de separar a las personas del problema

items.english: What would it take to make this work for everyone?
items.spanish: Â¿Qué se necesitaría para que esto funcione para todos?

items.english: I think we're making progress toward a resolution
items.spanish: Creo que estamos progresando hacia una resolución

items.english: Can we agree to disagree on this particular point?
items.spanish: Â¿Podemos acordar estar en desacuerdo en este punto particular?

listening.audio: What's the first step in resolving workplace conflicts?
How should you respond when someone disagrees with your technical approach?
options: Listen and discuss the merits of both approaches

fillInBlank.feedback: Patience allows all parties to express their views and work toward mutually acceptable solutions.
Focusing on underlying interests rather than fixed positions opens up more solution possibilities.
Diplomatic communication reduces tension and creates a more collaborative problem-solving environment.

items.english: Let's identify the areas where we already agree
items.spanish: Identifiquemos las áreas donde ya estamos de acuerdo

items.english: What are the non-negotiable requirements for each party?

items.english: I think we can build on this foundation

items.english: Are there any concerns that haven't been addressed?

items.english: I believe we're close to reaching an agreement
